SmartPhones

Huawei P40 Pro

Huawei P40 Pro smartphone runs on Android v10 (Q) operating system. The phone is powered by Octa core (2.86 GHz, Dual core, Cortex A76 + 2.36 GHz, Dual core, Cortex A76 + 1.95 GHz, Quad core, Cortex A55) processor. It runs on the HiSilicon Kirin 990 5G Chipset. It has 8 GB RAM and 256 GB internal storage.
